languages.text: "Либо он свихнулся и бредит, либо врет. Ставлю на второе".
"Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."
languages.original_text: "Либо он свихнулся и бредит, либо врет. Ставлю на второе".

traits.locale_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume the latter."
"Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume the latter."
"Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

"Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."
"Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

languages.text: « De deux choses l'une : soit notre suspect est en plein délire, soit il ment comme il respire. En ce qui me concerne, je penche pour la seconde solution. »
languages.original_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

traits.locale_text: « De deux choses l'une : soit notre suspect est en plein délire, soit il ment comme il respire. En ce qui me concerne, je penche pour la seconde solution. »

languages.text: «Nuestro sospechoso delira o miente. Probablemente lo segundo».
languages.original_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

traits.locale_text: «Nuestro sospechoso delira o miente. Probablemente lo segundo».

languages.text: “我们的嫌疑人要么是在妄想，要么是在说谎。我认为是后者。”
languages.original_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

traits.locale_text: “我们的嫌疑人要么是在妄想，要么是在说谎。我认为是后者。”

languages.text: 「容疑者の妄想か、彼が嘘をついているか…私は後者だと思う」
languages.original_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

traits.locale_text: 「容疑者の妄想か、彼が嘘をついているか…私は後者だと思う」

languages.text: "Entweder hat unser Verdächtiger Wahnvorstellungen oder er lügt. Ich gehe davon aus, dass es Letzteres ist."
languages.original_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."

traits.locale_text: "Entweder hat unser Verdächtiger Wahnvorstellungen oder er lügt. Ich gehe davon aus, dass es Letzteres ist."

languages.text: "Şüphelimiz ya hayal dünyasında yaşıyor ya da yalan söylüyor. İkincinin doğru olduğunu varsayıyorum."
languages.original_text: "Either our suspect is delusional or he is lying. I would assume it's the latter."
